page.title: 05EDUCATION (Continued)
page.content: {School. There are 8 classrooms,where we work. We also keep books,paper and other things.There are tables,chairs, bookcases,lockers and cupboards.We make drawings for the walls.There is a staffroom where the teachers have lockers to keep their handbags and shopping in.At playtime they have their tea and coffee there.In the hall we have Assembly and do P.E.Apparatus is kept there.We have hymn practice there on Fridays.In the music room there are guitars,recorders,a piono and music trolleys.We also watch television in there. The canteen is divided into two parts, for the dinners and the packed lunches.There are wooden tables and forms.When we have eaten we go and play and the dinner ladies have their, so do the staff and Mrs Robson.
